{"id":1191592555,"question_id":3332,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"1 week, 3 days","timestamp":1709390248,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"219 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1191592555/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Minimum Operations to Exceed Threshold Value II","memory":"98.6 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int minOperations(vector<int>& nums, int k) {\n        using ll = long long;\n        priority_queue<ll, vector<ll>, greater<ll> > pq;\n        for(int i: nums) pq.push(i);\n        int ans = 0;\n        while(pq.top() < k){\n            ans += 1;\n            ll a = pq.top(); pq.pop(); \n            ll b = pq.top(); pq.pop();\n            pq.push(min(a, b) * 2 + max(a, b));\n        }\n        return ans;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"minimum-operations-to-exceed-threshold-value-ii","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
